import React from 'react' import './ShoppingItem.css' function ShoppingItem({cartItems}) { return (
{cartItems.length === 0 ? (
cart item 0
) : (
{cartItems.length} in this cart
) }
{cartItems.map(item => (

{item.title}

{ item.count}x{ item.price}

)) }
); } export default ShoppingItem
